general_info.summary: This document lists various programs, schools, and administrative/academic functions of Sharda University, including the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. It also details reports, feedback mechanisms, university resources like brochures and tenders, leadership information, historical context, statutory bodies, and various skill development and awareness initiatives such as language and communication skills, soft skills, and entrepreneurship. The document further highlights FM Radio, guidelines for visa and medical insurance, mentoring portals, COVID-19 updates, international campuses, and courses on ethics.
